column4: I have a mouse with 5 buttons + wheel (the wheel is the middle button too), but only 2 buttons + wheel as wheel are working and there's no relevant options in Preferences - any clues ?
what mouse is it? my 5 button is working fine
Logitech MX310
actually it has an additional button on the top which in windows operates like alt+tab
lol thats the mouse i have, weird that its not working
I am using feisty if that helps
that extra button pisses me off, i hit it while switching sensitivity and it dumps me out of games, i dont know though, cause mine is working
no I mean gutsy
wait, do you have 7.10 or 8.04?
7.10 is gutsy right ? how do I make sure ?
gusty is 7.10, yea the buttons dont work in 7.10, they work in 8.04 though
yup it's 7.10 all right
I remember I'd managed to make it work in 7.04 though P:
yea, sorry about that, it didnt work for me in 7.10, but they work in 8.04
is there any cons in pressing that "Update Release" button in my update manager ?
baatii which vm are you using?
I mean, does any app stop working or something like that usually
baatii: what speed did you burn it at?
it could be broken then
try reburning at 4x
ok guys i feel stupid, where did the partition editor run off to, its not in system-admin anymore
so in 8.04 that mouse just works, no workarounds needed ?
